amendment.description: To reform procedures for determinations to proceed to trial by court-martial for certain offenses under the Uniform Code of Military Justice.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1578, under the order of 6/11/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 211.

action.text: Amendment SA 1578 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4090) To reform procedures for determinations to proceed to trial by court-martial for certain offenses under the Uniform Code of Military Justice.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1578, under the order of 6/11/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 211.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1578, under the order of 6/11/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 211.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1578 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 1463.
